property.name: identifier
property.dc:description: Other known identifier used for the same taxon. Can be a URL pointing to a webpage, an xml or rdf document, a DOI, UUID or any other identifer

property.name: title
property.dc:description: An optional display label for the URL that the publisher may prefer be displayed with the identifier or link

property.name: format
property.dc:description: mime type of content returned by identifier in case the identifier is resolvable. Plain UUIDs for example do not have a dc:format return type, as they are not resolvable on their own. For a list of MIME types see the list maintained by IANA: http://www.iana.org/assignments/media-types/index.html, in particular the text http://www.iana.org/assignments/media-types/text/ and application http://www.iana.org/assignments/media-types/application/ types. Frequently used values are text/html, text/xml, application/rdf+xml, application/json
